title: Mammoth Cave National Park: In-Classroom Programs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     In-Classroom Programs                In-Classroom Programs         Students working in classroom.   These programs are available to schools in the 10-county BRADD area that surrounds the park.  Programs are custom designed to complement what students are learning in the classroom.  All programs meet state educational goals.  Presentations last between 30 - 60 minutes each and are presented to one classroom at a time in order to allow students to ask questions and participate in discussions and/or experiments.  Several teachers may request programs on the same day.  Each teacher may request different topics.  For more information contact us.
